Installation
============

To install and test our program:

    .. code-block:: bash

        // Make sure you have node, Express, vue js installed first
        
        // clone repository

        git clone git@github.com:cyndzx02/MVP_LagosTrip-FreeProject_2025.git;
       
        // enter the repo
        cd MVP_LagosTrip-FreeProject_2025/

        cd agronova_backend/
        
        // then install dependencies
        npm install

        // then 
        npm start


        // As for the frontend test
        cd FRONT && npm install; npm run serve;
